'Paul Tracy' (born December 17, 1968 in Scarborough, Ontario, Canada) is a
professional automobile racer who has competed in CART, the ChampCar World
Series and the IndyCar Series. He is nicknamed "'PT'" and also goes by the
nickname "'The Thrill from [[West Hill, Toronto|West Hill]]'".
